name: ts-rollup-binlib
description: TypeScript Rollup Binary/Library NPM Package Template

scripts.check:formatting:fix: npm run check:formatting:src -- --write && npm run check:formatting:cli -- --write
scripts.check:formatting: npm run check:formatting:src && npm run check:formatting:cli && npm run check:formatting:ci:github
scripts.check: npm run check:formatting && npm run check:types
scripts.clean: npm run build:clean && npm run coverage:clean
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.build:clean: npm run build:js:clean && npm run build:types:clean
scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:cli && npm run lint:tests
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:src -- --fix && npm run lint:cli -- --fix && npm run lint:tests -- --fix
scripts.fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run check:formatting:fix

author: makadev <npm@makadev.de>
